availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Seeley (Nicholas County, KY, resident and Bourbon Co, KY, livery stable owner)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Canada. Father of Georgia A. Seeley, Carrie Seeley, and Lizzie Seeley. Livery stable operator in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, p. 585
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 276B
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 423B
KYR-0001-029-0439.
